org.pac4j.scribe.service

Class WechatService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.scribejava.core.oauth.OAuthService
      • com.github.scribejava.core.oauth.OAuth20Service
        • org.pac4j.scribe.service.WechatService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class WechatService
extends com.github.scribejava.core.oauth.OAuth20Service
    As of scribejava 5.3, the enumeration class ClientAuthenticationType does not support inheritance, and can not complete the client authentication of wechat.
    Since:
    3.1.0
    Author:
    zhangzhenli
